effect.sun_moon: Moves cannot score critical hits against this Pokémon. This ability functions identically to battle armor.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Moves cannot score critical hits against this Pokémon. This ability functions identically to battle armor.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Moves cannot score critical hits against this Pokémon. This ability functions identically to battle armor.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
